Pre-Game Insights: The 25th match of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 will see India (IND) squaring off against United States of America (USA) at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York on Wednesday, June 12.
It would be the first time these two squads will play each other.
A lot of Indian origin players are currently playing for USA.
Team bowling first has an upper advantage as pacers are able to swing the ball in the early overs.
The pitch at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York is a drop pitch, where all the matches have been low-scoring till now.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to take place at 8:00 PM IST.
The live score & commentary of the game can be followed in the Sportskeeda Live Score section.
India won their last match against Pakistan by six runs.
United States of America, too, won their last match against the Men in Green in super over by 5 runs.
Rishabh Pant is no doubt the best wicket-keeper pick for today's match.
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are the two best batsmen picks for today's Dream11 team.
Hardik Pandya made a terrific comeback after a mediocre IPL season as he has taken 5 wickets in the last two matches.
The top bowler picks for today's Dream11 team are Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh.
Hardik Pandya is currently one of the most crucial players for India.
Jasprit Bumrah is one of the most crucial picks for India, especially at this low-scoring pitch.
